message: Another year of success and happiness has passed. With every New Year comes greater challenges and obstacles in life. Student Welfare Group (SWG) IIT Kharagpur wishes you courage, hope and faith to overcome all of the hurdles you may face. May you have a great year and a wonderful time ahead.

Christmas gives us the opportunity to pause and reflect on the important things around us - a time when we can look back on the year that has passed and prepare for the year ahead.
Student Welfare Group (SWG) IIT Kharagpur wishes everyone Merry Christmas! :)

story: Mimamsa IISER Pune shared a post to Student Welfare Group (SWG)  IIT Kharagpur's Timeline.
message: Mimamsa IISER Pune shared a post to Student Welfare Group (SWG) IIT Kharagpur's Timeline. #Mimamsa2018 The wait is almost over! Registrations open now for the tenth edition of India's biggest Scientific quizzing event. Register in teams of four, at : http://mimamsa.iiserpune.ac.in/ Inviting all first, second and third year undergraduates. Registration portal will be active from 7th November to 20th December, 2017. Hurry! Cash prizes worth ₹1,15,000 to be won! #AreYouInquizitive #TenYearsOfMimamsa

बेरोजगार लोग एक बार जरूर पढ़े।
घर बैठे Online Work करें और
10000 से 15,000 रूपये हर महीने कमाये वो
भी कुछ खर्च किये बिना।
आपके पास Android Mobile होना जरुरी है। आपको क्या लगता है हम झुठ बोल रहे है?

तो जाने आप सब अपने ही Android मोबाइल से कैसे पैसे कमा सकते है।

इसके लिए सबसे पहले Champcash पर एक ID बनाना जरूरी है। Champcash पर ID बनाने के कुछ STEPS है जो निम्न है:-

1st STEP:
अपने फ़ोन के Play Store में जायें और Search में "Champcash Digital India App" लिखें और उस App को अपने मोबाइल में Install कर लें !

2nd STEP:
अब Sign Up with Champcash पर Click करके अपनी डिटेल्स (Name, Mobile No, Email Id) डाल दीजिये।
[Note: Apna WhyatsApp No hi Register kare]

3rd STEP: 
अब आपसे Refer ID of Sponsor पूछा जायेगा वहाँ पर 18966060 डाल दें और अपनी ID बना लें!

4th STEP:
अब आपको स्क्रीन पर Challenge ऐप्स के रूप में 7-8 ऐप्स दिखेगा जिसमें से 5-6 ऐप्स Install करने के लिए कहा जायेगा। इन ऐप्स को इंस्टॉल किए बगैर आप इसमें ज्वाइन नहीं हो सकते !

5th STEP:
सभी ऐप्स (5-6 ऐप्स) को एक-एक करके इनस्टॉल और रजिस्टर करना है। प्रत्येक ऐप्प पर रेजिस्ट्रेशन के बाद Open करना है और 2-3 मिनट Open रखना है।

Champcash मे आपकी ID Active होते ही स्क्रीन पर Congratulations! का मैसेज आयेगा और आपके Champcash एकाउंट में $1=62 Rs. आ जायेगा। एक बार आपकी ID Active हो जाने के बाद आप चाहे तो Install किये हुए सारे ऐप्स(5-6 ऐप्स) Uninstall भी कर सकते हैं।

जैसे ही आपकी ID Active होगी, हमारी Team आप से जल्द सम्पर्क करेगी।

*निम्न 2 बातों का ध्यान रखें* :-
[A] आप जिस मोबाइल में Champcash Install कर रहें उस मोबाइल का ही Internet इस्तेमाल करें।
[B] एक मोबाइल में एक ही Champcash ID बनाया जा सकता है।
                मैं  आपको बिस्वास दिलाता हूँ कि ये कोई Fake कंपनी नही है।        for Enquiry call my no. 9617974592 at9:30pm to 11:00pm

YourDost is finally here guys!

YourDOST is an online counseling and emotional support platform designed to foster mental wellness

Here are the steps you need to follow for registration:
1) Please visit the site(www.yourdost.com).
Make sure you are connected to the IIT kgp wifi, only then you access the services for free. Although once you are registered from here, you can use its services from anywhere. 
2) You can sign up with any email id and put up any username of your choice. There are various career experts, life coaches and counsellors present. You can anonymously chat with any of them.
3) Voice call and video call can also be arranged by booking an appointment from website itself. 

Every chat, voice and video call is accessible and it's totally an anonymous platform.

message: Student Welfare Group (SWG) IIT Kharagpur shared Technology Students' Gymkhana, IIT Kharagpur's post. YourDost for IIT Kharagpur is ready to kick off! We have a Launch Ceremony to be attended by Mr. Puneet Manuja, Co-Founder, YourDost alongwith a renowed psychologist who would enlighten the audience regarding mental health in educational institutions Be there in S.N. Bose Auditorium on 31st October, 2017 at 6pm!

story: Student Welfare Group (SWG)  IIT Kharagpur added an event.
message:
Python Workshop| Student Welfare Group
Date: 10:00AM
Time: 29-10-2017
Veunu: Nalanda Class Room Complex, IIT Kharagpur

Python has emerged over the past few years as a leader in data science programming.” 
One of the most relevant data science skills is the ability to evaluate machine learning. With increasing application in every sector and with more than 90% non-core companies offering jobs in this profile, it is the most sought-after skill in the present scenario. Student Welfare Group, in association with OrangeTree Global, hereby provides you with the first step to enter into the world of data analytics and machine learning. Give your brain a chance to test its analytic skill.
Register yourself here: https://goo.gl/forms/gbLD5RkBiv46x18B3

story: Pushpa Agrawal added a new photo to Student Welfare Group (SWG)  IIT Kharagpur's Timeline.

message:
Hola freshers!
As of now, we hope that you all have met your mentor and fellow mentees. If you people are not yet aware of your mentor or haven't met your mentor even once, then this is a gentle reminder for you to have at least one meeting with them. 
What more? We are releasing a feedback form to be filled by you, based on your experience with your Mentor. 
We always have tried to establish a better connection between you and your mentor and an honest feedback helps us to make this program better, so kindly fill the form given below sincerely. 
https://goo.gl/forms/RL6JG4LnEvSqCTl43

Hola freshers!
As of now, we hope that you all have met your mentor and fellow mentees. If you people are not yet aware of your mentor or haven't met your mentor even once, then this is a gentle reminder for you to have at least one meeting with them. 
What more? We are releasing a feedback form to be filled by you, based on your experience with your Mentor. 
We always have tried to establish a better connection between you and your mentor and an honest feedback helps us to make this program better, so kindly fill the form given below sincerely. 
https://goo.gl/forms/RL6JG4LnEvSqCTl43

We pay our humble tribute to the Apostle of peace and non-violence on Gandhi Jayanti. We are constantly guided by Bapu’s ideas and the path shown by him for creating a just and equitable society without any discrimination and empowerment of every section.

On this auspicious day, let us all pledge to work together to realize Mahatma Gandhi’s vision for a progressive, peaceful and harmonious Nation. To the man who inspired a country to freedom, we bow our heads. Happy Gandhi Jayanti!

story: Student Welfare Group (SWG)  IIT Kharagpur added 5 new photos.
message:
Hello Freshers!
Our Panel Discussion "Make Your Choice" seemed like a great success as a Large Number of Students attended the Event and cleared their various doubts regarding Department Change. Student Welfare Group  team feels immense pleasure and assure you to bring more such events for the benefit of student body. Here are few glimpses of the Panel Discussion held at  V4.
Cheers!

Fresher: I want to change my department what should I do?
Someone: Ask the people who made depc previous years.
Fresher:How?
Student Welfare Group:Make Your Choice!!

Hola Freshers!!
Student Welfare Group now provides you the solution of the most common fresher problem of IIT kharagpur.Department Change(depc) comes with What?How?Where? So here is the chance to 'Make Your Choice' by having a conversation with the people who made Depc in last years and get answers to all your queries.

Venue:V4
Date:01/09/17
Time:6:15 pm

#Day2

66 years to service of the Nation.

Attention Freshers! 
Student Welfare Group brings you the opportunity to know more about the Student Mentor Program. The objective of this programme is to help the First years understand the various aspects of college life, and adapt accordingly under the mentorship of experienced seniors.
An interactive session of all the First-Year Undergraduate Students with the SWG Team will be held on 17th August, Thursday at Vikramshila (V2) as per the following slot:
6:30 PM – AE, CE, CH, CS, EC, HS, IE, MA, MF, ME, NA & PH
8:00 PM – AG, AR, BT, CY, EE, EX, GG, IM, MT, MI & QD
